title: Gamification-Based Advanced Science Domain Chinese Vocabulary Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific terminology and vocabulary proficiency at HSK Level 4 or above
context.additional_context: Strengthening specialized science vocabulary learning through a Unity3D-based educational game platform in BYOD environments

learning_goals: They can analyze and utilize 500 advanced scientific Sino-Korean vocabulary items through decomposition/combination techniques.
Achieve over 85% engagement in gamified learning environments and cultivate self-directed vocabulary expansion skills.
Evaluate the ability to perform scientific paper translation simulation tasks through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
